favoriteProblems: How do we integrate ancient spiritual wisdom with modern technology and science?
How can we teach alchemical principles and fundamental laws of the Universe in practical ways?
How can we translate the archetypal language of Astrology and Alchemy into structured logic of AI Agents without losing the wisdom's 'spirit'?
How can I spend more time in nature rather than using digital devices?
How can technology enhance rather than replace human connection?
How can I generate financial abundance by gifting and sharing knowledge?
How can I help others connect to the divine that permeates our Universe?
How can I help others live with more health and energy?
What would be possible if humanity understood collaboration instead of competition?
How can Agents be used to interact with our organized knowledge?
What would business look like if every CEO had a 'Cosmic Dashboard' alongside their financial dashboard?
How can we design AI systems that serve a leader's internal soul mission, not just their KPIs?
How can we design living systems where human habitation increases biodiversity?
If humanity had access to a 'Cosmic Mirror' through AI, how would governance change?
